bill_title: to revise certain provisions pertaining to managed care for certain injured employees under workers' compensation.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions pertaining to managed care for certain injured employees under workers' compensation. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The requirements of managed care under § § 58-20-24 and 62-5-21 are met if the corporation, association, or organization, or the self-insured employer, contracts with a nurse case manager or other rehabilitation specialist for management of the case within sixty miles of the employer's place of business where the injured worker was injured. If there is no nurse case manager or rehabilitation specialist within sixty miles of the employer's place of business, then the venue indicated shall be the venue closest to the injured worker within South Dakota. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions pertaining to managed care for certain injured employees under workers' compensation. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The requirements of managed care under § § 58-20-24 and 62-5-21 may be met if the corporation, association, or organization, or the self-insured employer, contracts with a nurse case manager or other rehabilitation specialist for management of the case within sixty miles of the employer's place of business where the injured worker was injured. If there is no nurse case manager or rehabilitation specialist within sixty miles of the employer's place of business, then the venue indicated shall be the venue closest to the injured worker within South Dakota. BILL HISTORY 1/26/98 First read in House and referred to Judiciary. H.J. 232 2/11/98 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/11/98 Judiciary Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 12, NAYS 1.
